content.description: Sit start with edges. From there, head slight right to the large fin, then move up to the lip, and mantel atop the boulder.
content.protection: A pad. The landing is perfect.
content.location: It climbs the center of Bunny's north face.

content.description: Sit start with a hand on the arete and a right hand edge. From there, reach a right hand sidepull, bump up the arete, reach the jug, follow to the lip, and mantel on top.
content.protection: A pad. The landing is perfect.
content.location: It climbs the north side of the boulder's northeast arete.

content.description: Stand start matched on an undercling at waist height. From there, gain a right hand edge, follow to a two-finger left hand pocket, reach a right hand edge, then the lip, and mantel atop the boulder.
content.protection: A pad. The landing is perfect.
content.location: It climbs the center of Bunny's west face.

content.description: Sit start with a left hand undercling and a right hand sidepull-edge. From there, stand up with a big move to a great edge, continue up to the lip, and mantel on top the boulder.
content.protection: A pad. The landing is flat and clear.
content.location: It climbs the north face of Bunny.

content.description: Stand start with your choice of edge. From there, climb straight up to a good intermediate shelf, reach the lip, and mantel on top. I graded this one without using the obvious feature left of the problem. It perhaps climbs a grade easier with it.
content.protection: A pad. The landing is perfect.
content.location: Climb the east side of the boulder's northeast arete.

content.description: Stand start matched on a waist high undercling. From there, move left to the arete, and use edges to reach an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pad. The landing is very good though.
content.location: It climbs the west side of the boulder's northwest arete.
